text: Barghat is a town and a Nagar Parishada in Seoni district in the a state of Madhya Pradesh, India. It has an average elevation of 537 metres (1,761 feet).Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Barghat thumb ==Demographics== As of the 2001 India census, Barghat had a population of 20,000, with males constituting 51% and females 49%. Barghat has an average literacy rate of 73%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 56% of the males and 44% of females literate. 13% of the population is under 6 years of age. == Education And Sports == There are government and privately owned educational institutes. Some of them are: -Government Degree College Barghat -Govt ITI College Barghat. \- Shri Ram ITI college Now Barghat is setting to develop in a proper way as sports and sports ground are there such as \- Takkar singh stadium, here state championship is being organised (don't confuse with Ranji). -indoor stadium ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Seoni district Category:Seoni, Madhya Pradesh
title: Barghat
